**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 51 1.1 **Price** 45 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** L **Activate**Interact --- Hot tea with a comforting, flowery aroma, a soothing toddy grants you a +1 item bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects and against effects with a trait determined by the liquor mixed into the tea when it's created. These benefits last for 1 hour.

  • **Limoncello** [Olfactory](/Traits.aspx?ID=246)
  • **Whiskey** [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)
